name: Financial Statement Analysis
description: Examining corporate financial records for fraud, misrepresentation, and tax evasion.

cards.title: Forensic Auditing and Red Flag Indicators
cards.description: Identifying signs of fraud within corporate financial statements.
bulletpoints: Analyze inconsistencies in balance sheets and income statements
Identify shell companies and fraudulent bookkeeping practices
Use forensic tools to cross-reference financial transactions

cards.title: Tax Evasion and Financial Misconduct
cards.description: Investigating illegal tax avoidance schemes and fraudulent financial reporting.
bulletpoints: Track offshore accounts used for tax evasion
Analyze false deductions and fraudulent tax returns
Collaborate with international agencies for financial compliance
